objects.text: Premium Canvas • Leather Handles • Eco-Friendly Design
Sunsets and Palmtrees • California Spirit • Limited Edition

product_details.name: Los Angeles Vintage Canvas Tote - Classic California Lifestyle Bag
product_details.description:
• Premium black and beige canvas construction with genuine leather handles
• Iconic Los Angeles city seal design featuring Venice-Santa Monica-Malibu
• Spacious main compartment perfect for beach essentials, shopping, or daily use
• Durable brass rivets and reinforced stitching for long-lasting durability
• Stylish two-tone color scheme with white graphic print
• California-inspired 'Sunsets and Palmtrees' typography
• Eco-friendly reusable shopping bag alternative
• Dimensions suitable for everyday carrying needs
• Versatile design that matches both casual and sophisticated styles
• Perfect souvenir or gift representing LA's laid-back lifestyle

banner_details:
This banner showcases a premium fashion product with a sunset-inspired California theme. The background features a smooth vertical gradient transitioning from a muted blue sky at the top to a warm peach and sandy beige near the bottom, overlaid with a subtle sun and cloud shapes to emphasize a coastal sunset mood. Central to the layout is the "product_image" prominently displayed over the sun, catching the viewer's attention. The "heading" and "subheading" text layers at the top establish the product's identity and lifestyle appeal. Below the product, the "description_1" and "tagline" layers highlight benefits and uniqueness. The "price" text is prominently placed for emphasis, and a bold "cta" (SHOP NOW) button is positioned beneath it with a contrasting background rectangle ("cta_background") for visibility.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Blue (#1A3A5A)
- Sunset Orange (#F0A868)
- Warm Peach (#F4BB76)
- Pale Sand (#F7D6AC)
- Sun Yellow (#FFCC33)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image presents a stylish tote bag with a bold and minimalist color palette. The dominant color is deep black (#000000), forming the main body of the bag, creating a strong backdrop that allows the crisp white (#FFFFFF) typography and emblem to pop, offering high contrast and excellent readability. The top and bottom edges of the bag are bordered by a natural beige canvas (#E8E1D6), adding a soft neutral tone that grounds the design. The leather handles showcase a warm brown (#8B5B2A), introducing an earthy element that adds richness and complements the minimal scheme. Together, these colors blend sophistication and casual appeal, perfect for a sleek advertisement banner.
